name: sky lanterns
description:
run your sky lantern shop and help send customers' wishes into the sky

read the orders on the paper, pick up your brush, choose the correct chinese character to write on the lantern

when you're finished, put your brush down and watch your lantern fly up into the sky - if your wish has been accepted, something might happen ✧

--

programming & design by guiyyu
art & design by @linyuweicn (instagram)

[windows and mac builds included for better quality]
